sourcesContent: import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { IoChevronDownSharp, IoChevronUpSharp } from 'react-icons/io5' import * as Styled from "./styles" export const PetImages = ({images})=>{ const [img, setImg] = useState('') useEffect(()=>{ setImg(images) }, [setImg, images]) console.log(img) return( {img.map((img, index)=> )} ) }
